>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/cosmos/nft/v1beta1/supply/{class_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Supply queries the number of NFTs from the given class, same as totalSupply of ERC721.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"class_id associated with the nft","name":"class_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A successful response.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","title":"QuerySupplyResponse is the response type for the Query/Supply RPC method","properties":{"amount":{"type":"string","format":"uint64","title":"amount is the number of all NFTs from the given class"}}}}}},"default":{"description":"An unexpected error response.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"details":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"@type":{"type":"string"}},"additionalProperties":{}}},"message":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
